instruction: Analyze the emissions intensity of the MSCI World Climate Paris Aligned Index against active climate mutual funds and the MSCI World Index, focusing only on Scope 1 and 2 emissions.
output: According to the exhibit, the MSCI World Climate Paris Aligned Index had consistently lower emissions intensity compared to both active climate mutual funds and the MSCI World Index, focusing solely on Scope 1 and 2 emissions. This suggests that the MSCI World Climate Paris Aligned Index is a more environmentally responsible investment option than the other two indices.
